title: Easeout Weekly #7
body:
![JavaScript CSS and Sass logos](/images/uploads/css-sass-js.png) [Getting JavaScript to Talk to CSS and Sass](https://css-tricks.com/getting-javascript-to-talk-to-css-and-sass/) How can we exchange data between CSS, Sass and JavaScript easily? This approach looks at how we can share variables, to keep our code simple and DRY. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/getting-javascript-to-talk-to-css-and-sass/)
![Deprecated HTML Elements](/images/uploads/html-elements-deprecated.png) [Why Do Some HTML Elements Become Deprecated?](https://css-tricks.com/why-do-some-html-elements-become-deprecated/) Many old techniques and have gotten phased out as newer and better alternatives have been created. This article looks at some examples & asks why we don't use them anymore. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/why-do-some-html-elements-become-deprecated/)
![HTML Spectrum Diagram](/images/uploads/htmlspectrum.png) [Django Highlights: Templating Saves Lines](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/04/django-highlights-templating-saves-lines/) An exploration of breaking down a complex webpage into multiple templates, composing those components, and applying tags and filters to refactor a plain HTML page. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/04/django-highlights-templating-saves-lines/)
![Headless CMS And React Project](/images/uploads/building-web-app-with-headless-cms-react.png) [Building A Web App With Headless CMS And React](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/04/web-app-headless-cms-react/) This article introduces the concept of the headless CMS, a backend-only content management system that allows developers to create, store, manage and publish the content over an API. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/04/web-app-headless-cms-react/)
![Performant Animation Example](/images/uploads/performant-animations.png) [Performant Expandable Animations: Building Keyframes on the Fly](https://css-tricks.com/performant-expandable-animations-building-keyframes-on-the-fly/) Animations have come a long way, continuously providing developers with better tools. However, there are some animations that require a little bit more work. This article talks about how to handle more complex use-cases. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/performant-expandable-animations-building-keyframes-on-the-fly/)
![API, Authentication and JAMStack Logos](/images/uploads/oauth-flow.png) [APIs and Authentication on the Jamstack](https://css-tricks.com/apis-and-authentication-on-the-jamstack/) A well-architected authentication solution is crucial to maintaining the security of JAMStack sites. This article looks at four different methods for authenticating our API requests. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/apis-and-authentication-on-the-jamstack/)
![Overpopular Web Design Trends](/images/uploads/web-design-trend-popular.png) [What Should You Do When A Web Design Trend Becomes Too Popular?](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/03/web-design-trend-popular/) A guide to help you figure out whether to embrace a new design trend or not, or to embrace them but add your own unique spin. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/03/web-design-trend-popular/)
![UI Trends For 2020](/images/uploads/ui-trends-2020.png) [The Absolute Must-Know UI Trends For 2020](https://www.vectornator.io/blog/ui-trends-2020) A review of several innovative UI trends that are set to dominate this year. [Read it ➡️](https://www.vectornator.io/blog/ui-trends-2020)
![Colors Landing Page](/images/uploads/colors-dot-lol.png) [colors.lol](https://colors.lol/) "Overly descriptive color palettes." [Check it out ➡️](https://colors.lol/)
![United Nations brief to designers to help fight coronavirus](/images/uploads/covid-design-announcement.png) [United Nations Brief to Designers to help fight Coronavirus](https://www.itsnicethat.com/articles/united-nations-open-brief-creatives-creative-industry-300320) In its first open brief to the creative community, the United Nations is asking for designers to help produce concise and impactful visuals to help share life-saving information on Covid-19. [Read it ➡️](https://www.itsnicethat.com/articles/united-nations-open-brief-creatives-creative-industry-300320)
![The Building Blocks Of Design](/images/uploads/design-building-blocks.jpg) [Visual Design Language: The Building Blocks Of Design](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/03/visual-design-language-building-blocks/) A robust visual design language is the cornerstone of good design. Here’s how the team at Fantasy approached designing a mobile OS for Huawei. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/03/visual-design-language-building-blocks/)
![CSS Grid Layout](/images/uploads/4-grid-properties.jpeg) [4 CSS Grid Properties (and One Value) for Most of Your Layout Needs](https://css-tricks.com/4-css-grid-properties-and-one-value-for-most-of-your-layout-needs/) This article takes the unique approach of showing you the smallest possible set of grid properties you need to know to meet most of your layout needs. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/4-css-grid-properties-and-one-value-for-most-of-your-layout-needs/)
short: A weekly roundup of the latest web design & development news.
